title: ASking for a club with the name tag LeeSin
body:
I just wanted to join a club with the tag of "LeeSin" or a place for lee sin mains. I just want to join all the blind monks who miss their q. My Summoner name is Ashfault. 

Thank you and send me a request and i will highly appreciated it.

replies.body:
The tag LeeSin is too long, 5 characters is the max.
you could try making a club with: LæSin  or LœSin which are both 5 characters and uses Unicode U+00E6 for the ae hybrid character and U+0153 for the oe hybrid. I have looked through the Unicode table and can't find an hybrid characters for Le, ee, eS, Si or in. Not even Unicode for Silicon "Si" or any other elements exist.
